contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHCGO | image = | city = [[Ciudad Camargo, Tamaulipas|Ciudad Camargo]] | area = [[Ciudad Camargo, Tamaulipas|Ciudad Camargo]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] | branding = Radio Tamaulipas | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 90.5 FM | format = | power = 20kW | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = [[Tamaulipas]] | webcast = | website = [http://www.tamaulipas.gob.mx/radio/radiotamweb.asp tamaulipas.gob.mx] | affiliations = }} '''XHCGO''' (branded as Radio Tamaulipas) is a [[Mexico|Mexican]] [[Spanish language|Spanish-language]] public FM [[radio station]] that serves the [[Ciudad Camargo, Tamaulipas|Ciudad Camargo]], [[Tamaulipas]] area. ==External links== *{{FMQ|XHCGO}} * [http://www.tamaulipas.gob.mx/radio/radiotamweb.asp tamaulipas.gob.mx] * [http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/listtama.htm mexicoradiotv.com; List of Tamaulipas radio / television stations] <br clear=all> {{Ciudad Camargo Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Ciudad Camargo]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
